response.overview: Prominent gang leader Cyrus calls a meeting of New York's gangs to set aside their turf wars and take over the city. At the meeting, a rival leader kills Cyrus, but a Coney Island gang called the Warriors is wrongly blamed for Cyrus' death. Before you know it, the cops and every gangbanger in town is hot on the Warriors' trail.
response.tagline: These are the armies of the night. They are 100,000 strong. They outnumber the cops five to one. They could run New York City. Tonight they're all out to get the Warriors.
response.title: The Warriors

titles.title: Los amos de la noche (The Warriors)

cast.name: Leon Delaney
cast.character: Baseball Fury (Orange and Black)/ Punk (Plain Green)
